name: When Breads Fly
description:
You know that one thought that always comes to mind, the one where you wish there was a game just about bread, nothing else. Yes, that one.

Well, thought no more! It's a flipping game!

Just run and jump in this mobile-based browser sandbox!

If you like it, add it to your home screen!

Controls

Tap/click on the arrow button to jump

Tap/click on the L(Left) button to walk left

Tap/click on the R(Right) to walk right

Credits

Game concept: Robert

Vocals: Cruz

Backtrack: Samuel
